name: Patricia Evans
description: Patricia Evans is a mom and a health enthusiast at heart. She's keen on looking for reasons and possible solutions to health problems. Currently, she enjoys spending time with her kids. You can read some of her articles here: http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/author/patricia-evans
